video_prompt: Anime character with sweeping hair, head tilting, eyes shifting downward. Subtle facial expression changes, transitioning from introspection to melancholy. Light source subtly flickers and moves, highlighting facial contours and shoulder, casting dynamic shadows. Background subtly blurs and refocuses, while film strip borders subtly "breathe."
image_prompt: **Anime character, full body, film negative aesthetic. Dark-haired, short hair swept back, head tilted slightly, melancholic gaze. Orange-brown skin, full red lips, subtle blush. Lit by a soft, warm light from above left, casting shadows. Wearing a dark orange-red top, with hand resting on forearm. Out-of-focus dark background with horizontal bars. Black film strip border with rectangular holes. Dominant dark red and orange color palette.**
refined_video_prompt: Hair sweeps as a head gently tilts, eyes shifting downward. Subtle facial expression changes, transitioning from deep introspection to a quiet melancholy. A flickering, moving light dynamically highlights facial contours and shoulder, casting evolving shadows. Simultaneously, the background subtly blurs and refocuses, while film strip borders softly "breathe."
